name: custom-icon
title: Custom Icon
description: Customize icons. Set and reset custom icons for apps, files, and folders.
author: phlo

commands.name: set-custom-icon
commands.title: Set Custom Icon
commands.description: Set a custom icon with a given image or emoji.

commands.name: reset-icon
commands.title: Reset Icon
commands.description: Reset the icon to the default one.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
